mdRecord.dcterms:title: Prison and jailers at Richmond; Rebel prisons on Main St. near 25th St. Richmond, Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:alternative: The rebel prisons on Main St. Near 25th St. Richmond, Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From sketches by Mr. James Gillette (71st New York State Militia), who was a prisoner there for five months.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gillette, James
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Harper's Weekly
